text: Michael Solomon Gudinski AM (22 August 1952 â€“ 2 March 2021) was an Australian businessman. Gudinski was mostly known for forming the record company Mushroom Records in 1972. Gudinski was born in Caulfield, a suburb of Melbourne, Victoria. Gudinski died in his sleep while at home in Melbourne from a heart attack on 2 March 2021, aged 68. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1952 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Australian businesspeople Category:People from Melbourne
title: Michael Gudinski
